review: ik.imagekit.io
ik.imagekit.io
Pelayanan semua staf dari petugas cs sampai concierge ramah, cepat servicenya dan sangat puas dengan booking hotel festive melalui Traveloka.

Terima kasih saya mendapat free upgrade kamar untuk yang hari pertama, kamar bagus, pemandangan bagus, bersih cuma terlihat tua perabotan kayunya, breakfast enak cuma menunya tiap hari sama, dekat sekali dengan USS, banyak makanan, naik monorail free ke vivocity.
Hotel yang bagus untuk liburan keluarga. Kolam renang juga bagus dan indah. Dari hotel ke arena bermain hanya jalan kaki 5 menit. Hanya saja saya kurang nyaman dengan toiletnya.
Hotel nya nyaman, cocok untuk liburan bersama anak anak.
Kamar luas nyaman bersih, breakfast oke, kolam renangnya mantap.
ik.imagekit.io

Kamar yang saya tempatin selama 2 hari ini sangat pas dengan yang saya mau menghadap ke laut, ke kolam renang dan disinari matahari pagi ke arah kamar. Benar-benar menyenangkan sekali. Kamar mandi yang bagus. Akan tetapi 1 kekurangannya, yaitu kalau bisa ada semprotan air untuk membasuh ketika buang air besar atau buang air kecil di sekitar kloset. Karena bagi saya orang indonesia, sewaktu bilas saat buang air tidak cocok kalau tidak pakai semprotan air (sangat tidak nyaman jika hanya menggunakan tissue). Untuk sarapan, saya tidak pakai, mungkin next kalau menginap kesitu lagi order yang pakai sarapan. Untuk selebihnya top markotop. Kolam renang yang indah dengan view yang juga indah😍
Kamar besar, bersih, dekat dengan mal dan USS. Nanti pasti akan kembali lagi.

Great location! In between Hotel Michael and adjacent to Hard Rock Hotel; It’s a minimalis very eco friendly hotel- do not expect luxury full services. They provide water dispenser and ice machine in every floor, water carafe in every room for guest to re-fill. Even the swimming pool towel services is using vending machine. But overall a great experience. We’ve got 8th floor room at the highest floor and great view from the balcony.

The room was spacious enough for a family of 2 adult and 1 kid. Everything was clean. Especially love the smell and feel of the shower gel, shampoo and handwash! Also thumbs up for the hotel's efforts to make and encourages us to treat the environment with more care and litter less. 👍🏻
ik.imagekit.io
comfortable hotel..close to universal
Strategic location to us. Furniture quite old. But room size quite big with sofa bed and large bathroom. Nice view from the balcony. Unfriendly customer service facing queuing guests.
nice hotel, i can do our activity in one areas.. near to more attractions USS, sea aquarium, adventure cove.. and cozy hotel.. thanks
5 minutes away to cheers up your life (USS, cove waterpark and many more). Will stay again 😁😁
1 thing that's not good is staying at the family room but no wifi..
ik.imagekit.io
Nice and comfort hotel, good for family staycation
Good hotel and services ... and I will come back.   ❤️
Room is great. We were allowed to checked in earlier and have a late check out so that can have a longer stay and enjoy more.
I like to stay here, good and fast services.
ik.imagekit.io

Number of people that can accommodate family and the convenience is the best part and makes it value for money. Bad part was wen we entered the non smoking room smelled like cigarette smoke (but they were fast enough to send someone to have air cleaned) and i can clearly see dust on lampshades, family starts having allergy cough when entering room at night.
Very recommended for family vacation, we definitely will be back soon.
First time book this hotel, the price was affordable in this holiday season, hotel is good. Very satisfied.
Room's good. check in and check out very simple. place is nice and near uss. we love it here
Just walk to the USS, monorail, many fast food
Good and nice place, good location
Great hotel to stay for holiday
Good and nice hotel for family vacation
Very good location and variety attractions places
Very good, best to stay with family.

Booked a room for 2nights with free USS+SEA+water cove ticket for 2. It was really worthy. We got a family room, can fit for us (3 adults + 3 children). The room has 1 sofa bed, 1 king size, 1 big single bed (loft bed). Bathroom with bathtub. Hotel pool suitable for children. Non-breakfast room but you can find breakfast easily because it near with restaurant, hawker and seven eleven. Bed and pillow so comfortable. Overall, I really enjoy my stay. Day 3 we switch to hardrock hotel, because now pool is restricted to hotel guest only and I want kids to experience the sand pool at hardrock. But I got to admit, I really regret that. The sand pool at hardrock is under construction, the bathroom has no bathtub, only shower. bathroom has no door. yup.. no door! towel so smelly, floor so dirty. and location is the farthest than any other RWS hotel. better choose festive or michael or le meredien hotel for location.
The room was dirty, the bathroom floor and the room floor was very dirty.

We choose to stay at Festive Hotel as we are a big family and want to play at Universal. The family room was great and spacious. the kids love it. after a long day playing at Universal, they really enjoy and relax at the hotel. Recommend for family room. Usually it comes with ticket package, but I run out of it when booking.
It is most only a 4 star hotel.
Great location and convenient access
Great experience stay here, great ambience
Late check in. Less advise Good manner
A really great hotel to stay with family.
Spacious room with pool view. Lovely pool for kids and adult too
Room same place so dusty
The best hotel for family room and good service
My family have a really good time during our stay. The location in sentosa island so it just walking distance to universal studio, sea aquarium and many great places in the resort.

It was a busy month and the hotel was full. The restaurant for Breakfast was at Michael Hotel and needed to walk there which wasn't really that far. The rooms and beds were great. The Kids love the Loft bed. Thank you

This is my 2nd time staying at Festive Hotel but this time I'm little disappointed because the remote control for TV in my room does not work. When I ask a staff, he can only speak Mandarin. On the 2nd day, I'm back from Universal Studios Singapore at 5 pm. and my room is still on process of cleaning. So, I'm waiting in front of the room about 10 minutes and the staff say it's ready. Still, he does not clean my room perfectly.
Nice room & we had great experience there.

My children loved the bunk bed in the deluxe family room we stayed in. The small waterplay area in the pool was also great fun for the kids. But the breakfast was a bit of a disappointment. We had to go to Hard Rock hotel or Michael hotel for our breakfast buffet and the food was very mediocre.
All okay, only the floor is still dirty.

Standard hotel room, nice close to USS.

Festive hotel is a family hotel because I don't have to worry about separating rooms with my children. Rooms and other facilities are clean. Free entry to Sentosa Island by showing only hotel bookings. And we got a free monorail just across the hotel from a number of people who were staying.
Really expensive price, cramped room.

Excellent hotel close to universal studios with spacious rooms. There is 1 main bed and there is a sofa bed also a bed for children. My child loves to stay here.

We were given more time when checking out because the staff knew of our flight when returning at 5 pm. The staff is very friendly and responsive. The location is also strategic for the Sentosa Island region.
